author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/apex-legends/

All eyes are on you in the Haute Shot Event. Prove yourself worthy of the spotlight in the updated Arenas: Duels LTM, then build a summer-ready loadout with new beach skins, weapon skins, and the new Sky Piercer Universal Melee.

Anyone can be a Legend, but only you make it look this good.


Apex Legends™ is a free-to-play* battle royale game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation 5.

Credits:
Production Company: Electronic Arts & Dark Burn Creative
Sound Design and Mix: Respawn Entertainment & Mass Audio
All other categories: Electronic Arts & Respawn Entertainment

*Applicable platform account and platform subscription (sold separately) may be required. Persistent internet connection and EA account required. Age restrictions apply. This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire v
title: Apex Legends - Haute Shot Event Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Ready or Not, available July 15th.

To celebrate the PlayStation 5 release of Ready or Not, VOID Interactive invited some of gaming’s top creators to Los Angeles for a two day SWAT training experience, designed to showcase just how lifelike the game truly is. After completing the training, they put their new skills to the test in the game.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Ready or Not - Creator Experience trailer | PS5 Games
